commits.sourceNew:
/** * Creates a FuzzyTermEnum with an empty prefix. *

* After calling the constructor the enumeration is already pointing to the first * valid term if such a term exists. * * @param reader * @param term * @param minSimilarity * @throws IOException * @see #FuzzyTermEnum(IndexReader, Term, float, int) */ public FuzzyTermEnum(IndexReader reader, Term term, float minSimilarity) throws IOException { this(reader, term, minSimilarity, FuzzyQuery.defaultPrefixLength); }
